text: Windows Narrator is a tool for the visually impaired. The user has four options to customize their experience. ==Purpose== The tool reads text, message boxes, and mimics user typing. The voice, pitch, and speed can all be tailored to the user's preferences.Microsoft Windows comes to Narrator. Official Windows Site. ==Other tools== ===Microsoft Windows Speech Recognition=== ==Related pages== * Narrator * Microsoft Windows Speech Recognition ==References== ==Other websites== * Windows Official Site Category:Microsoft Windows software
title: Windows Narrator
